Text:
A quick scan looks and sounds good.
Thanks, Brownsugar13 -- maybe the only one on the net to release m720p movies WITH AC-3 DD5.1
I think this is 1 pass encoding. Bad blocking in the opening titles. Only just good enough encoding to look OK.
great copy overall and seeding now... thanks man

Finished watching the whole movie -- good stuff. Thanks again.

Interesting Note -- The aspect ratio kept changing back and forth from fully filling my 16x9 TV, to letter boxed for an even wider aspect ratio. 
Is this a new option for BluRay discs -- to zoom in sometimes (and cut off the sides)  ?
